title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Oct. 3
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for Oct. 3
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Yelena Shulyatyeva\u0010Senior US Economist\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the markets and economy with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Well, isn't that special? SPAC share sales near 2008 peak." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
